task_group_LivingRoom_desc: Lets clean it up before we explore it!
task_group_BedRoom_desc: Lets make this room a room for dream!
pop_room_locked: Continue playing to unlock more rooms!
error_loc_name: Failed to display correct item name!
info_box_default: TAP an item to see it's info.
info_box_undo: TAP Undo to bring back your item.
info_box_crate_text: There is something inside the crate! MERGE next to it or use Gems to open it.
info_box_locker_text: This item is locked! MERGE with it or use Gems to unlock it.
info_box_bubble_text: To get this item, use Gems to pop the bubble.
info_box_gen: TAP to get new items. MERGE with the same item to get the next level of {0}.
info_box_gen_max: TAP to get new items. This item is at MAX level, it can't be MERGED!
info_box_item: MERGE with the same item to get {0}.
info_box_item_max: This item is at MAX level, it can't be MERGED!
info_box_coll: TAP to collect {0} {1}. MERGE with the same item to get more {1}.
info_box_coll_max: TAP to collect {0} {1}. This item is at MAX level, it can't be MERGED!

info_box_gems.zero: TAP to collect {0} Gem. MERGE with the same item to get more Gems.
info_box_gems.one: TAP to collect {0} Gem. MERGE with the same item to get more Gems.
info_box_gems.other: TAP to collect {0} Gems. MERGE with the same item to get more Gems.

info_box_gems_max.zero: TAP to collect {0} Gem. This item is at MAX level, it can't be MERGED!
info_box_gems_max.one: TAP to collect {0} Gem. This item is at MAX level, it can't be MERGED!
info_box_gems_max.other: TAP to collect {0} Gems. This item is at MAX level, it can't be MERGED!

info_box_chest_Piggy: TAP to get Gold and Gems. MERGE with the same item to get the next level of {1}.
info_box_chest_Energy: TAP to get Energy. MERGE with the same item to get the next level of {1}.
info_box_chest_Item: TAP to get the items within.. MERGE with the same item to get the next level of {1}.
info_box_chest_max_Piggy: TAP to get Gold and Gems. This item is at MAX level, it can't be MERGED!
info_box_chest_max_Energy: TAP to get Energy. This item is at MAX level, it can't be MERGED!
info_box_chest_max_Item: TAP to get the items within. This item is at MAX level, it can't be MERGED!
info_box_chest_single_Piggy: TAP to get Gold and Gems.
info_box_chest_single_Item: TAP to get the items within.
info_box_chest_alt_Piggy: Full of Gold and Gems. Tap to get them out.
info_box_chest_alt_Energy: Full of Energy. Tap to get them out.
info_box_chest_alt_Item: Full of these items. Tap to get them out.
info_box_chest_locked: Unlock to get the items within. MERGE with the same item to get the next level of {1}.
info_box_chest_max_locked: Unlock to get the items within. This item is at MAX level, it can't be MERGED!
info_box_chest_timer: Don't wait. Speed up with Gems. MERGE with the same item to get the next level of {1}.
info_box_chest_max_timer: Don't wait. Speed up with Gems. This item is at MAX level, it can't be MERGED!
menu_inventory_description: Drag items from to the Inventory button to store them there. Tap on an item to put it on the board.
energy_menu_label_b: Generating new items costs energy. Buy more Energy by watching an Ad or by using Gems.
note_menu_purchase_failed_text: Failed to purchase the selected product.
note_menu_not_enough_gold_text: You don't have enough Gold. Buy some from the Store.
note_menu_not_enough_gems_text: You don't have enough Gems. Buy some from the Store.
level_menu_label: Collect more Experience to level up!
level_menu_rewards_label: Your rewards for reaching the next level:
terms_menu_label: By tapping the "Accept" button, you agree with our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
age_menu_label: Please select your age to continue.
confirm_label_need_gold: You don't have enough Gold! Buy some in the Shop!
confirm_label_need_gems: You don't have enough Gems! Buy some in the Shop!
confirm_label_exit: Are you sure you want to Exit the game?
confirm_label_reset: Are you sure you want to Reset the game? This action can't be undone! All your progress will be deleted!
confirm_label_locale: Please restart the game for the changes to take effect!
update_menu_label: A new version is available, please update the game to continue playing!
speech_Painting_-1: Is it a cat or a dog? I can't see through the dust!

speech_Painting_0.other: I have had better photos taken of me.

speech_Painting_1.zero: The pixels are so small, I can't see what it is. (-) Well at least it looks nice.

speech_Painting_2.zero: Aah, yes. Abstract art. (-) Nope, don't get it
speech_Painting_2.one: They say it's not about the beauty, but about the feeling when it comes to abstract art. (-) Well, I feel beautiful. What does that mean?

speech_Bookcase_-1.zero: I can't put anything in here, it will break
speech_Bookcase_-1.one: This thing has been in a better state.

speech_Bookcase_0.one: What should i put in here?

speech_Bookcase_1.zero: Interesting color, but not my taste

speech_TableLarge_-1.zero: So dirty. I can't put food on it!
speech_TableLarge_-1.one: I just wonder, how did this table break?

speech_TableLarge_0.zero: Aah, my new and shiny table!

speech_TableLarge_2.one: Everyone likes round tables! Well, except the ones that don't!

speech_Fridge_-1.one: This things melts everything i put in it. Is it just a big oven? (-) I'm confused!

speech_Fridge_0.zero: Much better. It even has a working freezer.

speech_Fridge_1.zero: To eat, or not to eat?

speech_Fridge_2.one: Is it gold or yellow? I can't tell!

speech_Bed_-1.zero: I really don't want sleep on that bed!!!

speech_Bed_0.zero: No that's a bed to sleep in

speech_Bed_1.zero: To sleep, or not to sleep?

speech_Bed_2.one: Huh, look at that! (-) It's a bed!

speech_BedsideTable_0.zero: I wonder, can I fit in there?

speech_BedsideTable_1.one: Does it pay taxes? (-) I hope so!

speech_BedsideTable_2.one: Too bad it doesn't have any drawers!

speech_Greeting_0: Welcome back, {0}. How are you doing?
speech_Tony_Random_0: What a cramped room. Not that I'm complaining, mind you!
speech_Tony_Random_1: I really need a cup of coffee.
speech_Tony_Random_2: NO! Again, I'm not Tony Stark! It's just Tony!!
speech_Tony_Random_3: They say that 42 is the meaning of life. I say, it just a number!
speech_Tony_Random_4: I was born on  May 10, 2023. They call me Tony. You don't need my last name.
speech_Tony_Random_6: PLEASE, don't hit me, I'll talk!
area_LivingRoom_desc: Since this is the 'Living' room, you can't die here!
area_Kitchen_desc: The kitchen is where all the cooking happens!
